title: The BOERUM - classy serif - FONT ID
content:
Looking for an ID on this classic looking serif font.

Many thanks in advance!  
Danny

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20150328042633im_/http:/typophile.com/files/IMG_5395_6426.JPG)

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [IMG\_5395.JPG](http://web.archive.org/web/20150328042633/http:/typophile.com/files/IMG_5395.JPG) | 35.81 KB |
author: Danny_Miller

comments.content:
Only found similar typefaces:  
 [http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/shinn/beaufort/](http://web.archive.org/web/20150328042633/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/shinn/beaufort/ "http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/shinn/beaufort/")  
 [http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/itc/symbol/](http://web.archive.org/web/20150328042633/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/itc/symbol/ "http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/itc/symbol/")  
 [http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/ef/copperplate/](http://web.archive.org/web/20150328042633/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/ef/copperplate/ "http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/ef/copperplate/")

Perhaps the firm that designed the identity would be willing to share the info:
